anya-e0806n1:3_0: Sabbavacanānaṁ sātthakaniratthakattabyabhicārittā ‘ida’ntiādinā sadiṭṭhantena saṁsayamupadassiya sātthakattamassa dassetuñca ‘na tāva…pe…
anya-e0806n1:4_0: Atha aādyādisaddānaṁ sādhuttānvākhyānāya idaṁ vacanamiccādivikappantarasambhave kathaṁ niyamo vuttiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:4_2: ākārādayo niggahītantā’iccādinā vuttiyaṁ vakkhamāno attho yassa taṁ tathā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:4_3: sādhūnaṁ sādhusaddānaṁ anusāsanaṁ ākhyānaṁ attho payojanaṁ yassa tanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n1:5_0: Sādhusaddānusāsanasaṅkāpettha “katthettha kutrātrakvehidhā”ti (4-100) ādinā katthādisaddānaṁ sādhuttānusāsanassa dassanato,
anya-e0806n1:5_1: lakkhaṇantarena sādhubhāvassa anvākhyātattāti āpubbādāiccasmā “dādhātvī”ti (5-45) ippaccaye ākāralope
anya-e0806n1:5_2: ca ādīti aādiyesanti aññapadatthasamāse yomhi “yosu jhissa pume”ti (2-93) ‘ṭe aādayo’ti,
anya-e0806n1:5_3: tayo ca cattālīsā cāti cattha samāse “tadaminādīni”ti cata lopeca rasse ca titālīsāti,
anya-e0806n1:5_4: ‘vaṇṇa-vaṇṇane’iccasmā “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti (5-44) appaccayeyomhi ṭādese vaṇṇāiti ca sijjhanato,
anya-e0806n1:5_5: payoganiyamatthanti titālīsavaṇṇasaddesu paresu eva aādisaddo payujjīyatīti evaṁ payoganiyamatthaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:5_6: ayampi vikappantara sambhāvanā “abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārā cī”ti (4-119) payoganiyamassā jhāyamānassa diṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n1:5_7: ṭhānyādesatthanti aādisaddassa ṭhāne titālīsavaṇṇasaddā ādesā honti tesaṁ vā so iti,
anya-e0806n1:5_10: agamāgami bhāvatthanti aādisaddassa titālīsa vaṇṇasaddā āgamā honti tesaṁ vā so iti,
anya-e0806n1:5_13: āgama liṅgābhāvatoti ukāra kakāra makārānaṁ abhāvato,
anya-e0806n1:5_17: saddalakkhaṇā nupayogatoti saddalakkhaṇena saddasaṅkharaṇassa pakatattā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:5_20: na hi visesana visessabhāve paṭipādite aādyādisaddānaṁ rūpavisesassa saṅkharaṇaṁ kataṁ siyāti,
anya-e0806n1:5_22: tathā sati ‘nīluppala’miccādīnampi vattabbatā āpajjeyyāti nāssa tadattha tāpi sambhāvīyate,
anya-e0806n1:5_23: loke sīhaguṇassa mānavake dassanato upacārena ‘sīho-yaṁ mānavako’ti tagguṇajjhāropopi dissati,
anya-e0806n1:5_24: tadatthampetaṁ na hotīti dassanatthaṁ ‘tagguṇajjhāropanatthampetaṁ na hotī’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:5_27: tassa ajjhāropanaṁ-titālīsavaṇṇasaddesu vā aādisaddeyeva vā āropanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:8_4: na gunnampi ānayanaṁ bhavati..gunnamupasajjanīya bhūtattā aññapadatthasseva padhānattā,
anya-e0806n1:8_11: itarathā byañjanaparasseva rassatte dassite titālīsaiti abyañjane padaṁ na sampajjeyyāti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n1:8_16: sakkatānusārenāti sakkate “sandhi yakkharānaṁ rassā na santī”ti vuttassa anusārena,
anya-e0806n1:8_18: na hiccādiṁ vadato-yamadhippāyo ‘rassāivāti ivasaddo sādhammopamājotako vā siyā vedhammopamājotako vā,
anya-e0806n1:8_20: rassadhammassa e okāresva sambhavā tesaṁ dīghakālappavattito te dīghāyeva siyuṁ,
anya-e0806n1:8_22: tesu rassadhammassasambhavā rassakālappavattito rassāeva te siyunti ‘etthātiādīsu e okārānaṁ uccāraṇakālakataṁ rassattameva hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n1:8_23: rassakālavantoyevāti evasaddo sogate vaṇṇavinimmuttassa kālassevābhāvā vaṇṇānañca paccakkha siddhattā
anya-e0806n1:8_24: pamāṇasiddhaṁ pāramatthika me okārānaṁ rassakālavantataṁ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:8_25: atthāti vadato panāyamadhippāyo ‘etthātiādīsu yadi ekārādayo dīghāeva saṁyogapubbattā rassāva siyuṁtathā
anya-e0806n1:8_26: sati atthāti etthāpi dīghova ākāro saṁyogapubbattārasso iva uccatīti āpajjeyya,
anya-e0806n1:8_30: payojanābhāvāti tena sādhetabbassa kassaci iṭṭhassa abhāvamāha,
anya-e0806n1:8_33: aññathā ‘rukkhā vana’ntiādīsu viya samudāye vākyaparisamattiyaṁ “iyuvaṇṇā jhalā namassante” (1-9) iccādikaṁ na sijjhatīti,
anya-e0806n1:8_34: paccekaṁ vaṇṇā nāmahontīti akāro vaṇṇo nāma hoti ākāro vaṇṇo nāma hotītiādinā,
anya-e0806n1:8_35: avayaveccādinā vuttiyaṁ avuttepi ‘pacceka’nti vacane sadiṭṭhantaṁ kāraṇamāha,
anya-e0806n1:8_37: ettha hi paccekanti avuttepi devadatto bhojīyatūtiādinā paccekaṁ bhuñjikiriyā parisamāpīyate,
anya-e0806n1:8_39: athavā samudāyepi vākyaparisamā pattiyaṁ sati samudāye pavattā saddā avayavesupi vattantīti ‘samuddekadesadassanepi samuddo diṭṭho,
anya-e0806n1:8_40: khandhekadesa bhūtāyapi paññāya paññākkhandhotiādīsu viya na doso,
anya-e0806n1:8_42: vaṇṇasaddassa guṇādyanekatthattepi pakaraṇato akārādayovettha vuccantīti āha-‘vaṇṇīyati’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:11_0: Nanu jhalādisaññā viya lahusaññaṁ akatvā kasmā gurusaññā katāti codanaṁ manasi nidhāya ruḷhi anvatthavasena
anya-e0806n1:11_1: dvippakārāsu saññāsu jhālāti ruḷhi saññātthābhāvena vohārasukhamattapayojanā,
anya-e0806n1:11_2: anvatthasaññā pana tappayojanāpi hoti tadaññappayojanā pīti dassetumāha- ‘eva’miccādi,
anya-e0806n1:11_3: vaṇṇīyatī attho etehīti vuttamatthaṁ anugatā anugatatthā vaṇṇasaññā taṁ,
anya-e0806n1:11_12: sabbañcetamupacārena vaṇṇasaddavacanīyattaṁ gacchati vaṇṇamayattāti sabbopi sammutiparamatthabhedabhinno
anya-e0806n1:11_13: attho vākyādhigamanīyo vaṇṇeneva viññāyati nāma tasmā yathā vuttamattha visesadassanaṁlahusaññāya na
anya-e0806n1:11_14: sakkāti tadatthamakārādīnaṁ gurubhūtā vaṇṇasaññā katāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:11_17: Ubhohi panetehi bhinno tatiyo koṭṭhāso nāma natthi,
anya-e0806n1:12_0: Duve saccāni akkhāsi, sambuddho vadataṁ varo,
anya-e0806n1:17_0: “Ādayo titālīsa vaṇṇā” “titālīsādayo vaṇṇā”ti vā vattabbanti na tathā sati sandiddhaṁ suttaṁ siyāti,
anya-e0806n1:17_4: saddasādhanamattappayojanattā pana sabbavidhānassa pubbācariya saññāvālametthāti kiṁ punāpi vaṇṇādisaññāvidhānena ganthagārava karaṇenāti saccametaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:17_5: pubbācariyesu pana gāravaṁ tadanugamanañca dīpetuṁ kāci saññāyopyanvākhyāyante,
anya-e0806n1:17_6: yajjevaṁ saṁyogasabbanāmalopādayopi saññā pubbācariyehi vuttā vattabbāti nanu bho vuttamevāmhehi’kāci saññāyo ākhyāyante’ti,
anya-e0806n1:17_7: kintadākhyānadvārena bhavatā tāpi viññātuṁ na sakkāti,
anya-e0806n1:17_10: lopena niddiṭṭhattā panassā assavanaṁ sannikaṁsavacanicchābhāvā saṁhitāyāniddeso,
anya-e0806n1:17_13: saresupi ekaṭṭhāniyā akārādayo bahuttā paṭhamaṁ vuttā ṭhānānukkamena,
anya-e0806n1:17_17: byañjanesupi vaggā bahuttā ṭhānappaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṁ vuttā,
anya-e0806n1:17_26: tesupihakāro kesañci orasopi hotīti dvijattā pacchā vutto,
anya-e0806n1:17_27: kehici “laḷānamaviseso”ti dvinnamavisese vuccamānepi lipibhedena ṭhānabhedena ca bhinnattā ḷakāro visuṁ akkharabhāvena gahito,
anya-e0806n1:17_28: sopi ghosabhāvena ṭhānānukkamenaca hakārato paraṁ vutto niggahītaṁ pana sarattādisabbavinimmuttattā sabbapacchā vuttanti akārādīnamayamanukkamo,
anya-e0806n1:17_29: imassevānukkamassa manasi vipassa vattamānattā titālīsāti gaṇanāparicchedassa dassitattā ca ‘niggahītantā’ti vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:17_34: amhehi pana kathamakārādīnamayamanukkamo uppannoti sissānaṁ kaṅkhā vicchedappayojanampati anukkamasaddassa atthakathanabyājena vaṇṇito yevāti,
anya-e0806n1:17_41: tampana vaṇṇuccāraṇato abbhantaro bāhiyo ca ussāho,
anya-e0806n1:17_48: “e onama vaṇṇe”ti (1-37) sutte vaṇṇeti kathanameva vaṇṇasaññākaraṇe payojanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:17_50: tasmā “dasādo sarā”iccādo ‘tenā’tiādīsu ‘tena saraiccanena kvattho kasmiṁ sutte payojanaṁ taṁ dasseti
anya-e0806n1:17_53: kasmā pana’so cemināva ñāpakena siddho’ti vuccati nanu ‘tadaminādīni”ti (1-47) suttaṁ dissatīti,
anya-e0806n1:17_55: evasaddo pana ‘yadi ñāpakena vaṇṇalopo siyā so imināva ñāpakena siddho,
anya-e0806n1:19_0: Nanu aādayoti paṭhamantenuvattante kathamettha’tatthā’ti sattamīniddiṭṭhatāti āha-‘tañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:19_1: atthavasāvibhattivipariṇāmenāti aādayoti paṭhamantassa‘ādo dasā’tyanena sambandhā sambajjhamāne cādhāratthena
anya-e0806n1:19_2: bhavitabbanti ādhāratthavasena sattamī vibhattiyā parivattanenāti attho,
anya-e0806n1:19_3: atthavasā sattamiyā vipariṇāmasambhavāyevasutte avijjamānepi‘tatthā’ti vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:19_4: ādodasannamanaññatthapavattisambhavato tesaṁ aādayo visayabhāvenapi sakkā parikappetunti vuttaṁ-‘tesu visayabhūtesū’ti,
anya-e0806n1:19_6: vaṇṇasamudāyato tadekadesabhūtāna mādo vaṇṇānaṁ dasasaṅkhyāguṇena niddhāriyamānattā,
anya-e0806n1:19_7: ādimhi dasa vaṇṇāti vutte avuttānampi avassaṁ vattabbānaṁ ūnapūraṇatthamajjhāhāro hotīti vuttaṁ- avaṭṭhitā niddiṭṭhā vā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:19_8: ekādīna maṭṭhārasantānaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ saṅkhyeyye vattanato āha-‘dasasaṅkhyāya paricchinnattā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:19_9: gayhupagānaṁ rassae ovaṇṇānampi kaccāyane viya apariccāgā anūnā,
anya-e0806n1:19_10: agayhupagānaṁ tadaññesaṁ kesañci sarānaṁ pariccagā anadhikā,
anya-e0806n1:19_11: dasasaddassa saṅkhyeyya vuttittā dasannampi adhikatavaṇṇānaññattā vuttaṁ-‘dasannampī’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:19_12: sayaṁ pubbā’rāja=cittiyaṁ’tīsmā kvimhi antalope samāse ca tadaminādittā niruttinayena vā sarasaddo nipphajjatīti,
anya-e0806n1:19_13: ‘sara-gatihiṁ sācintāsu’ iccasmā appaccayena vā nippajjatīti dassetumāha=‘sayaṁ rājantī’tiādi.
anya-e0806n1:21_1: heṭṭhā viyāti heṭṭhā vuttaṁ atthavasā vibhattivipariṇāmaṁ upameti,
anya-e0806n1:21_3: tesuti pana niddhāraṇattavivacchāyaṁ tampi sambhavatīti tesaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ majjhe dvedveti dvisaṅkhyāya niddhāraṇatthopi veditabbo,
anya-e0806n1:21_7: Nanu samānā vaṇṇā savaṇṇātyanvatthe savaṇṇasadde sati kataṁ rassadīghānaṁ savaṇṇasaññā siyā…
anya-e0806n1:21_10: nevampi vattuṁ yuttaṁ“dvedve savaṇṇā”ti suttassa tādisasāmatthiyasabbhāve sabbhāvena (potthake) visesakāraṇābhāvāti āha‘samānattampanā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n1:21_11: Tiṭṭhanti ettha vaṇṇā cittajattepi abhibyatti vasenāti ṭhānaṁ kaṇṭhādi,
anya-e0806n1:23_0: Oraso iti viññeyyo, kaṇṭhajo tadasaṁyuto”ti vadanti.
anya-e0806n1:25_6: nanu ca pubbasaddo yamekattā ekaṁ pubbamācikkhati na sakalanti kathaṁ “pubbo’ti vutte yoyoti ñāyati ‘yoyo
anya-e0806n1:25_7: pubbo’ti ca vutte ‘tesu dvīsu’ti ettha’dvīsu dvīsu’ti idaṁ kathaṁ sukheneva patīyate tadidamasiddhenāsiddhasādhananti
anya-e0806n1:27_0: Sesamiccādinā‘tesu dvīsūti savaṇṇasaññakesu dvīsu’ iccādi kamatidissati.
anya-e0806n1:27_2: saṁyogapubbassa rassassa dīghassa ca gurusaññā na vattabbā…
anya-e0806n1:29_0: Kevala byañjanānamatthappakāsattābhāvā sarānamatthappakāsane accantopakārā byañjanāti ‘etehī’ti karaṇattena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:34_0: Sajātyapekkhāya samudāyavācittepi kādayotī anuvattanato vaggasaddena kakhagaghañādayova gayhanti,
anya-e0806n1:34_3: sutte ādibhūto pañcasaddo pañcasaṅkhyāparicchedaṁ kurumāno māvasānānaṁ vaggānaṁ bahuttaṁ gametīti ‘pañcakā’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:36_0: Anekatthattā dhātūna muccāraṇatthopettha gaṇhātīti nipubbā tato kammanti ttappaccaye ññimhi pādisamāse dīgheca rūpaṁ dassento ‘rassā’tiādīmāha,
anya-e0806n1:36_4: niggahena itanti amādisa māse rūpaṁ dassento ‘karaṇaṁ niggahena vā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n1:40_0: Taṁ sabbatthe namanato, viduṁ nāmanti tabbidū.
anya-e0806n1:41_13: aniṭṭhappasaṅgonāma nāmāti (potthake) pacati-inda (udaka pakhuma) saddādīna manta ādimajjhabhūtaivaṇṇādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:41_14: jhalasaññā vidhāya tato parāsaṁ sādi vibhattīnaṁ “jhalā sassa no”ti (2-81) ādīhi ‘no’ ādesādimhi kate
anya-e0806n1:41_24: Itthiyanti idanti “pitthiya”nti sutte itthiyanti idaṁ padaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:41_25: Vaṇṇavisesanaṁ siyāti “pitthiya”nti sutte ‘iyuvaṇṇā’ti anuvattanato ‘itthiyaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā’ti evaṁ ivaṇṇu
anya-e0806n1:41_26: vaṇṇā “gho”ti sutte ‘itthiyaṁ ā’tievaṁ avaṇṇassa ca visesanaṁ bhaveyya.
anya-e0806n1:41_29: Sakkānāmavisesanaṁ kātunti dvīsu suttesu itthiyantiādinā vakkhamānakkamena.
anya-e0806n1:41_30: Nāmassa anto nāmantoti samāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā samāse guṇībhūtassa nāmassa itthiyanti idaṁ visesanaṁ kātuṁ na sakkāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:43_0: Kokilā kumudānī vo, pasevante vanaṁ jalaṁ” (260).
anya-e0806n1:46_1: ante ivaṇṇuvaṇṇāti ca vutte tesamā dhārādheyyasambandho ādheyyassādhāre pavattiṁ vinā na sambhavatīti ajjhāhāravasena ‘vattamānā’ti vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:46_2: Ivaṇṇu vaṇṇāti apekkhiya‘visesīyantī’ti bahuvacanametaṁ sambandhassa purisādhīnatāya nāmantīminā sambandhe sati‘visesīyatī’tekattena pariṇamati.
anya-e0806n1:48_1: Heṭṭhā sabbattha saññino niddisiya saññāya niddiṭṭhattā tattha viya visuṁ saññino paṭhamamaniddese asanto
anya-e0806n1:48_6: Pacchāvuttamattenāti “ghā”ti sutte kāriyino ākārassa pacchā vuttamattena.
anya-e0806n1:55_1: yanti aniyamena “ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe”ti (2-43) ādīsu atotiādikaṁ visesanabhāvena vattumicchitaṁ parāmasati,
anya-e0806n1:55_2: tenāti vise sanattenu-pādiyamānena yaṁ saddaniddiṭṭhena atotiādikena karaṇabhūtena,
anya-e0806n1:55_3: yathākathañcitabbatoti ādo majjhe-nte vā sabbhāvato yenakenaci ākārena abhedopacārena akārādivisesanavato nāmādino,
anya-e0806n1:55_5: nādo na majjhe yassa taṁ tadantaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:55_14: na sabbatthappasaṅgoti saṁhitādividhimhi sabbattha tadanta vidhippasaṅgo na hoti,
anya-e0806n1:55_15: tathāhi “saro lopo sare”ti (1-26) ettha saroti visesanabhāvena vacanicchāya sabbhāve saroti tatrā’dīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:55_20: tathā sati ‘tatrime’tiādimhi ‘ime’tiādinā vattabbatā āpajjeyyāti payogaṁ nānusaṭā nāmasiyunti na sabbattha tadanta vidhippasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n1:55_21: tathā “gatibodhā” (2-4) disuttādimhipi ‘gamayati māṇavakaṁgāmaṁ tyādippasaṅgotiādi ca yathāyogamavagantabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:57_6: tañcopasilese bhavamadhikaraṇaṁ pubbassa vā paraṁ siyā parassa vā pubbanti pubbaparopasi lesassāvisiṭṭhattā pubbaparānaṁ sambandhassa avisesā,
anya-e0806n1:57_8: satītyasmiṁ atthe jotanīye sattamī saṁsattamī santasaddassa samādesena,
anya-e0806n1:57_13: sattamiyā niddese satiyeva taṁ sambandhāya sattāya sambhavo,
anya-e0806n1:57_19: karitvā taṁmanasikatañcodanaṁ dassetumāha-‘tamaha’nti ccāditi evamettha sājjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0806n1:57_23: ayamadhippāyo “tasminti niddiṭṭhe pubbassā”ti (1-1-66) pāṇiniyavacane “disirayamuccāraṇakriyo nisaddopyaya miha nerantariyaṁ joteti,
anya-e0806n1:57_25: byavahitepi payogadassane byavahitepi kāriyaṁ pappotī”ti bhassakārādayo vaṇṇenti,
anya-e0806n1:57_28: mathurāya pāṭaliputtakassa cāntarāḷe gāmādīnaṁ sabbhāvā byavadhānepi pubbasaddassa pavattiyā diṭṭhantamāha-‘mathurā’ iccādi,
anya-e0806n1:57_30: tasmā byavadhāne saralopo na hotīti evaṁ saṅkhepabyākhyānena vuttiya mattho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n1:57_34: vattuno yā icchā vacanicchā tassā anutūlena vidhānato atthassa kathanatoti attho,yena hi yamatthaṁ vattātidhātumicchati
anya-e0806n1:57_38: kathamupadesato vatticchā-vasīyate’ kathañca sāmatthiyatoti āsaṅkiya tamupadassetumāha-‘atocetyādi,
anya-e0806n1:57_42: yasmā kāraṇā anvayo gurupārampariyo padeso gurukulamupagamma pañhakaraṇādinā anvicchīyate gavesīyati,
anya-e0806n1:57_43: ato kāraṇā guruparamparā gataupadesato vasīyatoti attho,
anya-e0806n1:57_48: tassa ca opasilesikādhāra mantarena aññathānupapattiyā ādhāravisesappaṭippattīti idamettha sāmatthiyaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:57_51: pasaṅgābhāvato atthanta-renāpi ādhārantarepi opasilesikādhārepi vacanantarappasaṅgo siyāti sambandhasambhavā
anya-e0806n1:57_52: opasilesikādhāranissayanepi ānisaṁso na dissatīti samuccayatthenāpi natthi payojananti vajjetabbo yampi saddoti,
anya-e0806n1:57_53: nanu kimevaṁ vaṇṇīyate pubbasseveti vacana mevopasilesikamadhikaraṇaṁ viññāpayati…
anya-e0806n1:57_57: ‘gaṅgāyaṁ ghoso’ti vutte ghoso gaṅgāyaṁ pubbo vā paro veti gammamānattā sāmīpikepyadhikaraṇe pubbaparattassa sambhavāti attho,
anya-e0806n1:57_58: etāvavuccateti pubbasseva hoti na parassāti ettakameva vuccate,
anya-e0806n1:57_65: tyuttarassa” iti (1-1-67) paribhāsāsuttadvaye chaṭṭhīgahaṇamanuvattiya ‘tasminti niddiṭṭhe pubbassa chaṭṭhī’
anya-e0806n1:57_66: ‘tasmātyuttarassa chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhe pubbassa chaṭṭhīti pubbassa kāriyittapaṭipādanayoggo chaṭṭhī tabbodhakapade
anya-e0806n1:57_69: ujjotaṭīkā ti chaṭṭhīpakappanaṁ paṭipādenti ‘yasmiṁ sutte chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi,
anya-e0806n1:57_71: idha pana vacanantarābhāvepi yattha chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi,
anya-e0806n1:57_76: yathā “vagge vagganto”ti etthānuvattamānaṁ niggahīta’ntidaṁ chaṭṭhīyantaṁ viññāyate,
anya-e0806n1:57_77: kathaṁ vaggetesā sattamyakatatthā “niggahīta”nti (1-38) pubbasutte katatthatāya paṭhamā vibhattiyā chaṭṭhīvibhattimpakappeti
anya-e0806n1:57_79: Etāva vuccateti vutte idanti na viññāyateti āha ‘kinta’ntiādi,
anya-e0806n1:57_81: Kimidamuccate pariyāyappasaṅge niyamatthaṁ vacananti nanu pubbaparānaṁ yugapaduppattiya mācariyavacanappamāṇenāppaṭipattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:59_3: pubbaparāpekkhattenāvisesāti yathā- ‘gāmā devadatto’ti vutte so tato pubbo parogeti viññāyatītyavadhibhāvassa pubbaparāpekkhattenāviseso,
anya-e0806n1:59_4: tathehāpi “ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe”ti (2-41) vuccamāne ato pubbesaṁ yonaṁ athavā paresanti pubbaparāpekkhattenāvadhibhāvassāvisesāti maññate,
anya-e0806n1:59_5: pure viyātyanena sattamiyanti ettha vuttaṁ niddesavacane kāraṇamatidisati,
anya-e0806n1:59_6: vuttiyaṁ ‘narānamere’ti ettha apavādavippaṭisedhe satiparattā ṭāṭeādesānaṁ pavattiṁ “ādissā”ti ettha vaṇṇayissāma,
anya-e0806n1:59_7: atha kimiminā vacanena nanu yato yattha pañcamī niddeso tattha sabbattha “mānubandho sarānamantā paro”
anya-e0806n1:59_8: (1-21) tyato ‘paro’tyanuvattetuṁ sakkāti tassānuvattitassa yonamiccanena sāmānādhikaraṇyā‘paresaṁ yonaṁ’tyayamattho
anya-e0806n1:59_12: paroti tyanuvattamānaṁ ‘ato’ti pañcamyantena sambajjhamānaṁ na koci vāretā atthīti parato-kārato pubbesampi
anya-e0806n1:59_13: yonaṁ ṭāṭeādesā pappontīti vacaneneminā bhavitabbamevāti dassetumāha-‘vacane’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:59_17: pubbako parihāroti byava hitanivattiyā pubbasutte vutto “saretopasilesikādhāro”ti parihāro,
anya-e0806n1:59_18: na sambhavatīti iha sattamiyā abhāvā na sambhavati,
anya-e0806n1:59_20: te hi “tasmātyuttarassā”tyettha (1-1-67) niddiṭṭhaggahaṇamanuvattiya tena pubbe viya byavahitanivattimpaṭipādenti.
anya-e0806n1:59_22: katatthatāyāti vacanā jātiyātyāha- ‘paccāsatyā jātiṁ sannissāyā’ti jātiṁ sannissāya paccāsatyā karaṇabhūtāya nivattimāheti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:59_23: iminā paccāsatti ñāyabyāpanañāyajātipadatthabyattipadatthesu paccāsattiñāyo jātipadatthoceha nissīyateti dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:59_24: na hi kevalaṁ jātiṁ nissāya byavahitanivatti vattuṁ sakkā,
anya-e0806n1:59_26: tadā byāpanañāyena byavahite cābyavahite cāsajjatīti jātiyā nissayane satyapi byavahitepi byāpyamānā
anya-e0806n1:59_27: jāti kena nivārīyate nāpi kevalaṁ paccāsattinnissāya byavahitanivatti vattuṁ sakkā,
anya-e0806n1:59_29: byattiyañca padatthe paṭilakkhiyaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ pavattatīti paccāsatti ñāyanissayanepyabyavahitampati yaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ bhinnaṁ tadabyavahite pavattaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:59_31: tañca vacanappamāṇato mābhavatvassa byatthatāti byavahitepi pavattate,
anya-e0806n1:59_36: ‘osadhyo’ti ettha sakāre akārā parassa dhakārena byavahitassa yossa viyāvasesānampi sabbhāvato vuttaṁ-‘yoppabhutīna’nti,
anya-e0806n1:59_41: katohi jātyattho kasiṇoti yasmā sakalo brāhmaṇa jātisaṅkhāto attho parisamatto,
anya-e0806n1:59_43: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti- ‘yāva diṭṭhambhojaye’ti vutte vuttena (potthake) santāya sāmaññavutti brāhmaṇasaddappayogasāmatthiyā
anya-e0806n1:59_46: “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) sutte byañjaneti sattamī pubbassa dīghādividhimhi caritattā “saramhā dve”ti (1-34) ettha saramhāti pañcamyaka tatthā,
anya-e0806n1:59_48: tato “sattamiyaṁ pubbassa” “pañcamiyaṁ parassā”ti dvinnaṁ parassa samuṭṭhāpane ‘byañjane’ti sattamī parassa
anya-e0806n1:59_49: kāriya yogitāya atthato vibhattivipariṇāmena chaṭṭhībhāvena pariṇamatī…
anya-e0806n1:59_50: dvinnaṁ suttānaṁ vippaṭisedhe parassa balī yattāvāti etādisasāmatthiyasabbhāvato vuttaṁ-‘chaṭṭhīpakappanāpi pureviya sāmatthiyā’ti.
anya-e0806n1:61_0: Kiñci antassa sampattanti yaṁ ṭānubandhamanekavaṇṇaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0806n1:61_2: kiñci sabbasseti “ṭānubandhānekavaṇṇā sabbasseti” (1-19) ṭānubandhamanekavaṇṇañca kāriyaṁ sabbassa pattaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:61_4: tassāyama pavādo hotu ṭānubandhādikāriyaṁ kathanti āha-‘ṭānubandhe’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:61_12: “Chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti dasasadde-ntassa pattopi tadapavādattā “ādissā”tiādibhūtassa dakārassa hotīti āha ‘dakārassaro’ti.
anya-e0806n1:63_1: “vaṇṇassantassa”ti (1-1-52) sutte vaṇṇaggahaṇamantavisesanāyopadiṭṭhaṁ pāṇininā-antassa padassa vākyassa vā mābhavī’ti,
anya-e0806n1:63_2: iha tvanatthakaṁ vaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ byavacchejjābhāvāti dassetumāha-‘so ce’ tyādi,
anya-e0806n1:63_3: nanu brahmassāti visesanatthena vattumicchito mahābrahmasaddo chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭho nāmāti “brahmassu vā”ti
anya-e0806n1:63_5: tathā sati ‘na hi chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhassa antaṁ padaṁ vākyaṁ vā sambhavatī’ti kasmā vuttanti,
anya-e0806n1:63_6: vuccate- na visesanatthenākkhepamattena mahābrahmasaddo chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭho nāma bhavatīti na brahmasaddassa sabbassādesappasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n1:63_7: mahābrahmasadde vā brahmasaddo atthīti tassāntassa uttaṁ vidhīyate.
anya-e0806n1:65_3: tassa ca “vānubandho”tyayaṁ yogo bādhakoti bādhakabādhanattho sampajjate,
anya-e0806n1:65_5: panayane vā vattateti apodyante ussaggalakkhaṇāni vajjīyante nīvārīyante apanīyante nenetyapavādo,
anya-e0806n1:65_6: suttekadesena suttamevopalakkhitanti antassa‘chaṭṭhiyantassā’ti suttassa apavādo antāpavādo,
anya-e0806n1:69_1: ādyantasaddānaṁ niyatavayavavācittā avayavassa cāvayavināmantarenā sambhavato sāmatthiyāvayavī lakkhīyati,
anya-e0806n1:69_4: teneva paccayavidhimhi kūppaccayādayo na dosā bhavantīti,
anya-e0806n1:69_7: katākatappasaṅgittāti otte katepi akatepi vukāgamassa pasaṅgato,
anya-e0806n1:69_8: bhūyattattā hi ottassa bhūggahaṇe sati katepi otte vukāgamena bhavitabbamakatepi tatova “katākatappa
anya-e0806n1:69_9: saṅgī yo vidhi sanicco”ti niccattā ottaṁ bādhitvā vukāgamo hoti,
anya-e0806n1:69_10: atha vukāgame pacchā tena na bhavitabbanti āha-‘antāvayave’ccādi.
anya-e0806n1:71_0: Yadiniddhāraṇe chaṭṭhī antassāvisesitattā avisesena yato kutoci antato bānubandho paro siyā,
anya-e0806n1:71_5: tena “sutānumitesusutasambandhobalavā”ti rundhatītetthadhakārassā numitassa maṁ na hotīti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:71_6: samāna jātiyasseva loke niddhāraṇappatīti hoticcāha-‘tathā hi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:71_7: yathā’kaṇhā gāvīnaṁ sampannakhīratamā’ti vutte avisesitattepi kaṇhāya kaṇhāgāvīyeva patīyate,
anya-e0806n1:71_8: tathehāpi sarānaṁ majjhe antātyantattena niddhāriyamāno samānajātiyo saroyeva patīyate,
anya-e0806n1:71_10: visesanattoti “ñilatasse”ti (5-163) sutte assāti vutte ayameveti niyamābhāvā yassakassaci akārassa ñippatti,
anya-e0806n1:71_11: tenāniṭṭhappattīti lānusaṅgisseva assāti lassa yaṁ visesanattaṁ taṁ attho payojanamassa “kattarilo”ti (5-18) lakārassāti visesanattho lakāro,
anya-e0806n1:73_1: so cāññādhikyaiṭṭhādyanekatthopi idha iṭṭha vācī daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n1:73_3: (5-44) sāmaññena vihitattā vippaṭisedhananti atthe ghaṇi vippaṭī sedho,
anya-e0806n1:73_6: saṁsiddhiyaṁ vattamānopi sidhi upasaggasambandhe nātthantarepi hotīti aññamaññavirodhotyattho,
anya-e0806n1:73_8: kathampana pamāṇabhūtassācariyassa vacanesu aññamaññavirodho sambhavatīccāsaṅkiya ubhinnaṁ sāvakāsatte
anya-e0806n1:73_9: sati sambhavati nāññathāti ‘dvinna’miccādi vuttigantho pavattoti vattuṁ ‘socā’tiādimāha aññamaññānajjhāsiteti
anya-e0806n1:73_11: anubhayatāginīti yo visayekadeso ubhayanna bhajate tasmiṁ anubhayabhāgini visayekadese,
anya-e0806n1:73_13: tattha pavattippasaṅge sati soca vippaṭisedho jāyatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:73_14: iminā vippaṭisedhassa visayo pavattippasaṅgo visayavisayīnamabhedena sutte ‘vippaṭisedho’tivuttoti ‘dvinna’miccādinā vuttigantho racitoti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:73_15: paro hotī tividhidassitoti iminā yadi niyamo-bbhūpagato siyā,
anya-e0806n1:73_17: pāṇiniyā hi jātiyaṁ padatthe sakimeva lakkhaṇaṁ pavattatīti caritatthattā visayantare dvinnampi lakkhaṇānamappavattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:73_19: byattiyantu padatthe latvādīnamiva pariyāyappasaṅge niyamatthanti paṭipannā,
anya-e0806n1:73_20: idha pana jātiyaṁ byattiyañca dvinnampi suttānamappavattiyameva vidhyatthamevidaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:73_23: kāmato parisamāpanañcetissā sabbasmiṁ attano gocare avicchedabyāpanena pavattisabbhāvato.
anya-e0806n1:73_28: abhimatakāriyavidhāne liṅgabhāvena saddikānumatattā(tesaṁ) vidhīnaṁ vidhāyakañca tasmāti attho.
anya-e0806n1:73_33: viruddhācāti dvinnaṁ vacanānaṁ pamāṇattā ubhinnampi appavattīti sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0806n1:73_34: Samānabalānaṁ dvinnaṁ lokepi virodhittaṁ ekakkhaṇeyeva ubhinnampi kāriye appavatti ca dissatīti diṭṭhantamāha ‘lokece’tyādi,
anya-e0806n1:73_35: ettha ca pessassa (a)virodhatthino kāriye appavattiriva appavattiyeva (potthake) samānabalāna mubhinnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:73_36: vacanānaṁ kāriye appavattīti sukheno pamāsaṁsandanaṁ viññātabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:74_0: Jātipakkheyeva bhassakārena dvinnaṁ yugapadippattiyaṁ ‘latvādīnamiva’ pariyāyappasaṅgo vaṇṇito,
anya-e0806n1:74_6: yattha yasmiṁ dhātvatthekadese pavattā samānā pavattā santo laddhāvakāsā siyuṁ tassekadesassa parihārenāpi pariccāgenāpi na vidhīyanteti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:74_7: latvādīna mekakkhaṇe asambhavā ekasmiṁ kate satītaravacanāna mānatthakyappasaṅgāca pariyāyena bhavantīti yantaṁ yuttanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n1:74_13: vippaṭisedhe yaṁ bādhitaṁ tambādhitamevā”tīmāsamubhinnaṁ paribhāsanampavattiṁ paṭipādento āha- ‘parasmiṁ ce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n1:74_15: paribhāsanampana ayamattho ‘punappasaṅgavijānanāti dvinnaṁ suttānamekatthappa saṅgasaṅkhāte vippaṭisedhe satiparamiṭṭhaṁ paṭhamaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n1:74_16: hontena tena yadītarassa nimittopaghāto na kato tadā tassāpi punappasaṅgo tassa vijānanā siddhanti,
anya-e0806n1:74_17: vippaṭisedhe yathāvutte sati paṭhamaṁ hontena yaṁ suttaṁ bādhitaṁ tassa punappavattiyā yadi nimittaṁ natthi taṁ bādhitameve’ti.
anya-e0806n1:74_20: evaṁ maññate ‘byattiyaṁ paṭilakkhiyaṁlakkhaṇappavattiyaṁ dvinnaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ ṭhānampati yāni vacanāni
anya-e0806n1:74_23: Byattiyampi yathāvuttānaṁ paribhāsānaṁ pavatti vuttavidhinevāti dassento ‘paribhāsānampi’ccādimāha.
anya-e0806n1:75_0: Jātiyampadatthe “vattamāneti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe,
anya-e0806n1:75_2: vattamāne si tha iccādīnaṁ vākyekadesānaṁ gacchaticcādo gaccha siccādo ca lakkhiye sakimpavattiyā sabbasmiṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_3: sake visaye paṭhama majjhimapurisekavacanajāti parisamattāti caritatthattā tumhe gacchathāti ettha dvīhi
anya-e0806n1:75_4: dvinnaṁ purisāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyaṁ na kassaci,
anya-e0806n1:75_5: byattiyampi paṭilakkhiyaṁ lakkhaṇāni bhijjantīti sādhāraṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ patibhinnehi lakkhaṇehi dvinnampekatthe-kakkhaṇe pavattiyaṁ na kassaci,
anya-e0806n1:75_6: tathā vuttanayeneva tiṇṇaṁ purisānamekakkhaṇe pavattiyanti sabbathā appavattiyaṁ sampattāyaṁ vacanamidaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:75_7: paro hotīti majjhimuttamaṁ bhavatīti adhippāyena ‘yathe’ccādinā vuttaṁ vuttiganthampañhamukhenā haritvā dassetuṁ ‘kvapanā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n1:75_8: nedamudāharaṇamamhaṁ manaṁ bhoseti-yato vippaṭisedhavisayamevedaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0806n1:75_9: kuto yato “vattamāneti anti”ccādippabhutīnaṁ vattamāneti anticcādīhi vākyekadesehi niddiṭṭhānameva pubbaparacchakkānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_10: purisavacanavisesavidhāyakena “pubbaparacchakkāna mekānekesu tumhāmha sesesu dvedve majjhimuttamapaṭhamā”
anya-e0806n1:75_11: (6-14) tīminā vākyāvayavena tumhāmhasesesu payujjamānesu appayujjamānesu vā yathākkamaṁ pubbacchakkānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_12: paracchakkānañca majjhimuttamapaṭhamānaṁ paccekaṁ dvedve vacanāni yathākkamaṁ bhavantīti ‘gacchatha gacchāmā’ti
anya-e0806n1:75_14: dvinnampana sāvakāsāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyeva hi vippaṭisedhoti,
anya-e0806n1:75_15: tathāpi vuttanayena vippaṭisedhappakappanāpi sakkā kātuntīdamudāhaṭaṁ siyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:75_16: imissā pana paribhāsāya nirākulappavatti “ādissā” tīmissā vuttanayena veditabbā,
anya-e0806n1:75_18: yotvakateyevāyamaniccoti vuttaniccāniccesu antaraṅgabahiraṅgesu cātulyabalattā nāssa yogassa byāpāro,
anya-e0806n1:77_1: vuttiyaṁ “yonavayavabhūto saṅketo”ti sāmaññena vuttepi “bhāsissaṁ māgadhaṁ saddalakkhaṇa”nti saddalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n1:77_2: bhidhānappakaraṇato saddassānavayavabhūtoti viññāyateti dassetumāha-‘kassa’tyādiltuppaccaye lakāro udāharaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:77_8: anupubbo bandhivināsatthoti āhu uccāritapadhaṁsittā anubandhyate vinassatetyanubandhoti imāya sadda byuppattiyāvasena.
anya-e0806n1:79_0: ‘Atenā’ti (2-108) ettha atoti rassabyattiniddeso vā siyā rassajātiniddeso vā sakalanissayabyāpī atthajāti niddesovā,
anya-e0806n1:79_1: tattha rassabyattiniddese sati buddhasiddhādīsu yatthakatthaci akāro gayhateti neṭṭhappasiddhi…
anya-e0806n1:79_3: rassa jātiniddese pana buddhasiddhādisabbākārantānaṁ lakkhaṇikagavādyakā rantānañcākāro gayhatīti sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhi,
anya-e0806n1:79_4: nāñño dīgho byattantarattāti nāniṭṭhappatti ākārato nāssenābhāvā,
anya-e0806n1:79_5: tasmā atoti rassajātiniddese nissite sabbamidamiṭṭhaṁ nipphajjatīti nātthajāti nissīyate,
anya-e0806n1:79_7: “yuvaṇṇāname oluttā”ti (1-29) ādīsu pana rassabyattiyā rassajātiyā vā niddese ‘tassedaṁ nopeti’ccādīsu eoādikamiṭṭhaṁ katthaci bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n1:79_9: sabbattha vā bhaveyya ‘vāteritaṁ samonā’tiādīsu byattanta rattā,
anya-e0806n1:79_11: athavā vaṇṇuccāraṇampati kesañci vaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānānaṁ uccanīcatadubhaya saṁhāravasena vaṇṇavisesuppatti
anya-e0806n1:79_12: dassanato tesaṁ vasena rassa byattiniddese rassajātiniddese vā vuttanayena iṭṭhāniṭṭhappattiyaṁ sabbathā
anya-e0806n1:79_14: tattha vaṇṇa parena savaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ niyamituṁ vacanamidamāraddhanti ‘sabbatthevā’tiādinā vacanārambhaphalamāha,
anya-e0806n1:79_18: aññaṁ vā (saya)to rūpanti siddhepyevaṁ sati atthettha paro koci visesoti ñāpetuṁ sañca rūpa’nti vuttikāro āhāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:79_19: rūpassa visesitabbattā ‘sañca rūpa’nti vuttiyaṁ niddisīyamānattā ca rūpanti viññāyatīti ‘sañca gayhatī’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:79_24: samāsena vuttattā padhānatū tattepi guṇo bhavati aññapadattho-kārekārādi vidhāya kattā,
anya-e0806n1:79_28: “tathā sayamattanī”ti nighaṇḍuto sayañca-ttākārekārādiñca gayhatītyamattho sambhāvīyatīti codanampanasi
anya-e0806n1:79_29: nidhāya ‘sañca rūpa’nti vadanto sādhippāyāruḷhaṁ kiñci atthavisesaṁ pakāsetuṁ tathevāhāti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ-‘sayañce’tyādi,
anya-e0806n1:79_35: tathā sati attaniyaṁ rūpaṁ nāmāttasaṅkhātasaddasambandhīti āha-‘saṁrūpaṁ saddānamasādhāraṇaṁ rūpa’nti,
anya-e0806n1:79_38: sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakatāya asādhāraṇanti rūpaṁ visesatā sādhāraṇassāpi sambhavo vuttoyeva nāmāti āha-‘duvidhaṁ hi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:79_42: taṁtaṁ saddattādīhi tesaṁtesaṁ buddha aiādīnaṁ saddānaṁ saddattādi,
anya-e0806n1:79_44: tena sādhāraṇaṁ saddarūpamattharūpaṁ tathā-sādhāraṇanti catubbidhaṁ saṁrūpanti dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:79_49: ca saddo panettha ‘idaṁ dassetī’ti heṭṭhā vuttaṁ samuccinoti,
anya-e0806n1:79_52: parassāpīti aññassa yassakassaci saddassāpi, iti idaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:79_55: yasmā idaṁ yathāvuttaṁ pasiddhaṁ tasmā pubbācariyaparamparāyāgato padesato upādiyantoti pakataṁ,
anya-e0806n1:79_60: cakkhuvisayopi hi attho kathaṁ sotavisayasaddassa na āsanno saṁrūpambhavitumarahatīti,
anya-e0806n1:79_71: idāni kāraṇattayaṁ samodhānetvā imehi kāraṇehi rūpameva saddassa saṁnāma,
anya-e0806n1:81_0: Ntusutiyā jantvādīnampi “ntantūnaṁnto yomhi paṭhame” (2-215) tyādinā gahaṇappasaṅge jātiyamabhippasaṅgabādhanatthaṁ
anya-e0806n1:81_2: (4-78) “kattari bhūte ktavantu ktāvī” (5-55) ti vihitā vantvādayo nāma.
anya-e0806n1:86_1: opasilesikādhāraṁ vinā ādhārantare gahite sati vacanantaraṁ suttantaraṁ vinā byavahitanivatti kātuṁ na ca sakkāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:86_3: te hi yadi vaṇṇena kālena vā byavadhānepi sandhi bhaveyya tadā sareti nimittasso pādānaṁ niratthakaṁ
anya-e0806n1:86_4: bhaveyyāti sareti nimittopādānasāmatthiyenānena vaṇṇādibyavadhāne no sandhīti maññamānā ‘nimitto’ccādikaṁ
anya-e0806n1:86_11: atha kho ‘ete na saccena suvatthi hotū’tyādo avasāne ‘pamādo maccuno padaṁ’ tyādo anta bindu saṅkhātanimittantare
anya-e0806n1:86_12: vā kāriyābhāvepi nimitto pādānassa sātthakatoti apisaddassattho,
anya-e0806n1:86_15: aññathā nimittopādānameva sātthakaṁ nāmāti ‘nimitto pādānassa sātthakato’ti na yujjati,
anya-e0806n1:86_16: ayametthādhippāyo ‘avasāne nimintare vā kāriyābhāvena byabhicārasabbhāvā aññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṁ sāmatthiyaṁ natthi,
anya-e0806n1:86_18: yathā’dārunimittaṁ vanopasaṅkamana’nti tasmā vaṇṇakālabyavadhānepi sareti nimitte sati lopakāriyaṁ pappote vā’ti.
anya-e0806n1:86_26: ihāti iminā satthantare bhāvasādhanavasena gahaṇaṁ vibhāveti,
anya-e0806n1:86_28: sarassa lopoti vā lopaṁ pappotīti vā avattabbattā,
anya-e0806n1:86_29: saroti paṭhamāya niddiṭṭhattā saro lopo nāma hotīti saṅkāpi siyāti āha-‘na ce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:86_32: ussaggato āgato sambhūto tassa vā ayaṁti ossaggiko pubbalopo,
anya-e0806n1:86_34: ossaggikattā pubbalopassa kāriyantarehi paralopādīhi apavādavidhīhi ābādhito eva,
anya-e0806n1:86_36: “paro kvacī”ti (91-27) kvaciggahaṇena pubbaparalopānaṁ tulyabalattābhāvā yathā gamappattito paralopassāpavādarūpattaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:88_1: kvaci lopanīyo hotīti idaṁ vacanaṁ dīpetīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:88_8: niccaṁ pakkhevā paralopo siyāti honticcādo niccaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:88_10: evaṁ maññate “kasminti atthe kvāti nipphannenāniyamavuttinā aniyamatthasseva visesakato vacane sabbatthevāniyatatthavuttittā
anya-e0806n1:88_12: tattha honticcādiko nicca pakkho paralopasseva visayo,
anya-e0806n1:88_13: latāvātiādiko aniccapakkho ubhayasādhāraṇattā pubbalopassāpi visayoti iminā niccaṁ pakkhe vā paralopo hoti,
anya-e0806n1:88_14: asantapakkho pana saddhindriyantiādiko pubbalopasseva visayo sabbathānena pariccattattā”ti,
anya-e0806n1:88_15: tīsupi cetesu pana pakkhesu niccāniccapakkhesu yevassāpavādarūpatā…
anya-e0806n1:88_16: pubbalopassa sabbathā honticcādo nivārakattā vā vidhāyakattā vā paralopassa,
anya-e0806n1:88_19: lokaggotiādi tu kvacisaddassa payogānusāritā dīpakattā nicce asantevāpi vidhimhi dīpite paralopena vā nipphajjatīti neṭṭhabyāghāto,
anya-e0806n1:88_20: evaṁ tāva kvaciggahaṇe sabbathāniṭṭhaparihārena iṭṭhappasiddhi siyā,
anya-e0806n1:88_22: pariyāyena bhavantīti kvaciggahaṇābhāve ‘paro’ti suttaṁ siyā tathā sati suttadvayamekavisayaṁ tulyabalañca siyā,
anya-e0806n1:88_23: tattha vippaṭisedhābhāvā pamāṇabhūtānamācariya (vacanā)naṁ niratthakatā mā bhavīti vārena bhavantīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:88_25: pakkheyeva siyāti latāvātiādīsu pubbalope pariyāyappavatte pariyāyena paralopassāppavattito latāvāti pakkheyeva paralopo bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n1:88_34: Nacevamiṭṭhanti evamidaṁ yathāvuttaṁ vikappavidhānaṁ saddalakkhaṇaññūhi nevābhimatanti attho,
anya-e0806n1:88_36: athā niccapakkhe vā paralope kate-nena pariccattaṭṭhāne ussaggappavattiyā latāva latevāti rūpadvayaṁ
anya-e0806n1:88_37: sampajjati tasmā payogānusāritādīpakena kvacisaddeneva honti saddhindriyaṁ latāva latevāti payoga sambhavopi,
anya-e0806n1:88_38: tathāpi aniccapakkhe latāivāti tatiyarūpappasiddhiyā pariyāyena bhavitabbanti parikappeti ‘nanu cetyādinā,
anya-e0806n1:88_39: atha “paro kvacī’ti kvaciggahaṇe sati apa(vādarūpa)ttā kathampariyāyappavattīti manasi nidhāyāniccapakkhe
anya-e0806n1:88_40: pariyāyappavattidīpanatthaṁ “na dvevā”ti suttitanti apavāde rūpattayepi pariyāyappavattiyaṁ dosābhāvamāha-‘nāyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:88_42: tathāhiccādinā “na dvevā”ti sutteneva pariyāyassāpi dīpitattaṁ sādheti,
anya-e0806n1:88_43: sā ca ekatthappavatti pariyāyaṁ vinā na sambhavati…
anya-e0806n1:88_45: nanu ca kvacābhāve pariyāyappavattiyaṁ yathāvutta dosassevāppasaṅgato mā hotu pariyāyo,
anya-e0806n1:88_46: bhinnavisaye pana pubbaparalopappavattiyā “na dvevā’ti nisedhe lateva latāva latāivāti rūpattayaṁ nipphajjatīti codanaṁ manasi nidhāyāha-‘nace’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:88_50: vikappena vā katthaci yathodakaṁ yathāudakaṁ tyādo pubbalopasseva katthaci itipi iccapiccādo paralopasseva
anya-e0806n1:88_51: katthaci lateva latāva latāivāccādo pariyāyenubhayalopasseva dassanatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:88_52: etthaca itipīti vavatthitavibhāsatta dīpanena kvacisaddena paralope kate-ññatra pubba lope sampatte “na
anya-e0806n1:88_53: dvevā”ti etthānuvattamāna kvacānubhāvena niccaṁ nisedhe iccapicceva bhavati.
anya-e0806n1:90_1: tathā ca sati aññoññānajjhāsi taṁ yathodakaṁ yathāudakaṁtyādi itipi iccapiccādica saṅgahitaṁ bhavatīti,
anya-e0806n1:90_2: pubbalope paralope ca pariyāyena sampatte dvinnampi pakkhe abhāve sati kathamidaṁ yujjatīti codeti‘yajjeva’miccādinā,
anya-e0806n1:90_3: yajjevanti hi ayaṁ nipātasamudāyo aniṭṭhāpādanārambha vattate,
anya-e0806n1:90_8: vattumiṭṭhattāti iminā sannikaṁso vaṇṇāna maddhamattakālabyavadhānā paccāsatti,
anya-e0806n1:90_9: sannikaṁsassetassa vacanicchāyaṁ satiyeva sandhikāriyaṁ hotīti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:90_14: kālantarenāti ubhayattha ṭhitavaṇṇāna muccāraṇakālato aññena majjhappatitakālena,
anya-e0806n1:90_18: yadipi sabbampetaṁ yajjevaṁtyādinā vuttaṁ kvaci saddappabhāveneva sijjhati,
anya-e0806n1:90_19: tathāpi pakāro-yampi satthe yojetabbo vāti dassetuṁ vutto.
anya-e0806n1:92_1: ‘yathākkamaṁ’ti tu vacanābhāve kathaṁ yathākkamantīdaṁ vuttanti āha-‘same’ccāti,
anya-e0806n1:92_2: samā saṅkhyā gaṇanā yesu te samasaṅkhyā-uddesino anudesino ca,
anya-e0806n1:92_8: e okārā anudesino ca dveti uddesīnamanudesīnañca ṭhānyādesānaṁ samasaṅkhyā siyā,
anya-e0806n1:92_13: pare “satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṁ lutte’ti sutte kvaciggahaṇakaraṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte asavaṇṇo vidhi hoti,
anya-e0806n1:92_14: tato idha na hoti diṭṭhupādāna”nti vadanti,
anya-e0806n1:92_15: kvacīti adhikāro idha na hoti mahussavo mātūpaṭṭhānanti,
anya-e0806n1:92_17: tena samānādhikaraṇo urasaddopīti urasminti nicca samāsattā asakapadena viggahe kate “asaṅkhyaṁ vibhatti”ccādinā
anya-e0806n1:92_19: ettha pana yuvaṇṇānanti saṁsāmi samīpasamūha vikārāvayavādīsu ṭhānyādesasambandhe chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0806n1:92_20: tasmā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ ṭhāne e oādesā hontīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:92_21: ṭhānampana tidhā apakaṁso nivatti pasaṅgo ceti,
anya-e0806n1:92_22: tattha gunnaṁ ṭhāne assā sambandhīyantu bajjhantu (jinindabuddhi) ti apakaṁso ṭhānasaddassattho,
anya-e0806n1:92_23: “semhassa ṭhāne kaṭukamosadhaṁ dātabba”nti nivatti “dabbhānaṁ ṭhāne sarehi attharitabba”nti pasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n1:92_27: sutte atthābhidhānāya ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ pavattippasaṅge tadatthābhidhānāyeva eoādesā bhavantīti.
anya-e0806n1:94_0: “Sattamiyaṁ pubbasse”ti (1-14) pubbassa kāriyavidhānato sattamī niddiṭṭhassa paratā viññāyatīti vuttiyaṁ ‘pare’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:94_2: parehi iccassa ajjhiṇamutto’ti sādhetuṁ “sabbocanti” “ajjho adhī”ti ca suttitaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:94_4: abbhakkhānanti abbhuggabho imināva siddhanti “abbho abhī”ti ca na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:94_5: iti+assa iti ṭhite paralopoti dassanatthaṁ ‘iti assa paralopo’ti āha,
anya-e0806n1:98_0: Antādesatthoti “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti (1-17) bādhakassa “ṭānubandhānekavaṇṇā sabbassā”ti (1-19) bādhakena “vānubandho”ti (1-18) suttena antādesattho,
anya-e0806n1:98_11: katepi tasminti tasmiṁ sutte vihite ca,
anya-e0806n1:98_12: na sijjhatīti evādissa riādeso na katoti katvā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:98_13: bhusaṁ+evāti (pana) ṭhite mahāvuttinā evādissa iādese rūpasiddhi hoteva,
anya-e0806n1:100_0: Rassadīghānanti sutte avutte kathaṁ rassadīghānanti labhati uddesinoti āha-‘dīghassā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:102_3: dve rūpāni hontīti iminā na sarūpappadhānoti dassitaṁ hotīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:102_5: dve rūpānihontītyādi vacanamidaṁ padamidaṁ (potthake) dasseti “sarūpappadhānepi dvisadde dvisaddasāmaññena saṅkhyādvisaddānusiṭṭhaṁ nappayujjate,
anya-e0806n1:102_7: iminā ca-tthappadhāno-yaṁ niddeso na sarūpappadhānoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:102_10: taṁ khaṇanti ettha ekaṅgavikalaṁ paccudāharaṇanti saramhā parattābhāvā na dvittaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:104_0: Tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāti kasmā vuttaṁ catuttha (dutiya) saddehi vaggakkharesveva gayhamānesu tathā niddeso yutto,
anya-e0806n1:104_1: na hi catunnampūraṇo catuttho dvinnampūraṇo dutiyoti akkharāyeva vuccantīti āsaṅkiya ‘vināpī’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n1:104_2: akkhare akkharavisaye catutthādi vohāro karīyamāno vaggaggahaṇaṁ vināpi vaggakkhareyeva ruḷho pasiddhoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:104_8: paccāsattīti pati āpubbā ‘sada-visaraṇagatyavasādanesu’iccasmā itthiyaṁ bhāvettimhi nipphajjatīti dassetumāha-‘paccāsīdana’miccādi,
anya-e0806n1:104_9: yathāyogganti catutthakkhare catutthassa tatiyo dutiyakkhare dutiyassa paṭhamoti evaṁ yoggamanatikkamma,
anya-e0806n1:104_10: dhassa dabhāvoti imināva pubbassa dhassa dattamupalakkheti,
anya-e0806n1:104_12: Theroti ettha ekāro vaggakkharo na hotīti tasmiṁ tavaggadutiyakkharassa tassa to paṭhamo na hoti.
anya-e0806n1:104_13: Panthoti ettha tavagga dutiyakkharena thakārena tabbaggabhūte nakāre satīpi na so tabbaggadutiyakkharoti na tassa paṭhamo to,
anya-e0806n1:106_3: tesu bhāravāhako koci tena pīḷito ‘aho bhāro’ti vattabbe sattivekallā ‘aho bāla’ iccāha,
anya-e0806n1:106_4: taṁsamīpavattī ‘kimayamāhe’ti kenaci puṭṭho samāno ‘aho bāla iccayamāhe’ti vadati,
anya-e0806n1:108_0: Nanu “vitisseve vā”ti (1-36) votyanuvattiya avaṇṇe eonaṁ vo hotīti ca sakkā viññātuṁ,
anya-e0806n1:108_1: tathā sati ‘avaṇṇe kvaci vo hotī”ti vattabbaṁ ‘ahoti vā’ti kasmā vuttanti codanamāsaṅkiyāha-‘okārassapi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:108_2: ṭhānibhāvena niddiṭṭhattāti “eona”nti (1-31) vakārādesassa vijjamānattā vakārādesampati puna okāro ṭhānibhāvena niddisitabbo na siyāti adhippāyenāha,
anya-e0806n1:108_3: na nimittanti eonaṁ vakārādesatthaṁ avaṇṇo kāraṇaṁ na hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:108_7: sve bhavanti viggayha tanappaccaye taddhitavuttiyaṁ vibhattiyā “ekatthatāyaṁ”ti (2-119) lope akārādese dīgheca syādimhi svātanaṁ dvitte hiyyattanaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:110_0: Katha‘māgamo hotī’ti vuttaṁ yadi niggahītamāgamo siyā sutte āgamaggahaṇena vā bhavitabbaṁ ña-ma-kādya
anya-e0806n1:110_4: tathā sati āgaminiddesābhāvā āgamattampi na siyāti codeti ‘yajjeva’miccādinā,
anya-e0806n1:110_5: na-iti codanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā tassa āgamattameva sādhetumāha-‘tassā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:110_9: purimā jātīti visesanasamāsekate rasse ca bindvāgamo,
anya-e0806n1:110_11: satipi payogānusārittadīpakassa kvacisaddassāpi vavatthitavibhāsatte vāsaddassāpi tādisattasseva paṭipādakatta
anya-e0806n1:110_13: vavatthitassa lakkhiyassa anurodhena lakkhaṇappavattikā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā,
anya-e0806n1:110_17: imasmiṁ ṭhāne āgamattappakāsako ṭhāninidde sābhāvā ādesattāyogasaṅkhāto kāraṇaviseso samattho,
anya-e0806n1:112_1: lopoti yadi kammasādhano siyā tadā tena samānādhikaraṇaṁ katvā upari “parasaro”ti suttamārabhīyeyyāti byatirekamāha ‘na parasaro’ti,
anya-e0806n1:114_0: Tvaṁsi tvamasīti vikappo, idha na hoti tāsāhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:116_0: Nanu vaggevaggantoti ettakeyeva vutte yasmiṁ (kismi)ñci vaggakkhare pare binduno yokoci vagganto aniyamena
anya-e0806n1:116_1: bhaveyya tathā sati aniṭṭhampi siyātyāsaṅkiya paccāsattiṁ sannissāyāniṭṭha nivattindassetumāha-‘vagge
anya-e0806n1:118_0: Nanu saddattā byabhicārittā evassa tāva saddo hotu, saṁyato,
anya-e0806n1:118_1: saṁhitoti saddekadesabhūtānampi sambhavā tepi gahe tabbā siyunti ‘yaevahi saddesu’ti yahīnampi kathaṁ saddavohāro katoti āha ‘evā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:120_0: Yasadde pubbasutteneva saṁssapyādese siddhe so ( ) (tassa) (potthake) ya kāramatteyeva pare saṁsseva (yathā) siyāti suttamidamāraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:122_2: sutte anuvattassa ca avijjamānattā ‘sarassā’ti kuto labbhatīti codeti ‘nanu ce’tyādinā.
anya-e0806n1:122_3: Āgamasutiyā vanādīnaṁ ṭhānisutiyā abhāvepi sāmatthiyā byañjanassa vā āgamo siyā sarassa vā,
anya-e0806n1:122_4: yadi byañjanassa vā siyā (na) “padādīnaṁ kvacī”ti (5-92) suttita mācariyena,
anya-e0806n1:122_5: tasmā tadeva ñāpeti ‘saro yevettha ṭhānī bhavitumarahatī’ti.
anya-e0806n1:122_7: nipubbā padismā anappaccaye “padādīnaṁ kvacī”ti yukaantāvayavo “tavaggavaranā”dinā (1-48) ye dassa jo
anya-e0806n1:122_9: mānantatyādīsūti adhikārāti “kyo bhāvakammesvaparokkhesu mānantatyādīsū”ti (5-17) ito mānantatyādīsuti adhikārā,
anya-e0806n1:122_11: kaccāyanena ‘atippagokhotāvā’ti sādhanatthaṁ “kvaci o byañjane”ti okārāgamo gakārāgamo ca suttantarena vihito,
anya-e0806n1:122_12: taṁ pakārantarena sādhetuṁ vuttiyaṁ-‘atippago kho tāvā’ti yaṁ vuttaṁ taṁ dassetuṁ ‘atippā’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:124_0: Dvādayo aṭṭhārasantā bahuvacanantāti ‘chakī’ti vattabbe ‘chā’ti ekavacanaṁ na yujjatīti codeti ‘nanucā’tiādinā,
anya-e0806n1:124_2: neti ‘chaḷo’ti ayutto-yaṁ niddeso na hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:124_5: pariccatto jahito attho vidhinisedharūpo yassa taṁ pariccattattaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:124_10: anukāriyassāti ekādino saṅkhyā saddassa tadaññassa vā yadanukāriyamekādikaṁ tadaññaṁ vā saddarūpaṁ tassa.
anya-e0806n1:124_12: “yomhi dvinnaṁ duve dve”ti (2-219) sutte dvisaddo-nukāriyaṁ dvisaddarūpaṁ tabbacanīyañca dvisaṅkhyāvisesamparāmasatīti
anya-e0806n1:124_14: atha ‘ḷañi’ti kasmā na vuttaṁ evañhi sati ñānabandhattāḷakāro ādyavayavo bhavitumarahatīti codanammanasi nidhāya ‘chasaddā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n1:124_15: antāpavādena vidhīyamāno ḷakāro cha saddā parassādissa āgamattā…pe…
anya-e0806n1:124_19: ādissāti iminā ḷassekavaṇṇattā antāpavādena “ādissā”ti sutte na ādyanto viyekopi saroti sarassādissa pattiṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:124_20: ayametthādhippāyo ‘chā’ti pañcamīniddesā “pañcamiyaṁ parassā”ti (1-15) parassa sampattaṁ kāriyaṁ ekavaṇṇattā
anya-e0806n1:124_22: Ādibhūtova hotīti asatipi ñakāre āgamaggahaṇānuvattiyā āgaminaṁ saraṁ avināsento tassa ādyavayavabhūtova hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:124_29: tattha hi sotaviññāṇavīthiyā laḷānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ gahaṇaṁ suti,
anya-e0806n1:124_30: taṁtaṁ desavāsīnaṁ lekhā va vatthānaṁ lipi,
anya-e0806n1:126_3: sādhūni bhavantīti vutti pāṭhassa atthaṁ vattuṁ ‘sādhūni bhavantīti nipātanato’ti āha,
anya-e0806n1:126_6: tesaṁ idha pāṭhāti tesaṁ tathā icchantānaṁ idhāti nipātassa imasmiṁ tadaminādisutte pāṭhā,
anya-e0806n1:126_7: uddhassa udūti uddhaṁ khamassāti aññapadatthasamāse uddhaṁkha iti ṭhite uddhaṁsaddassa uduādeso,
anya-e0806n1:126_8: asa-bhojane iccasmā “kvacaṇa’ iti (5-41) suttena aṇpaccaye asasaddo nipphajjatīti āha-‘pisitamasanā’ti
anya-e0806n1:126_9: “kvacaṇa” iti mahiyaṁ ravatīti ṭhite imināva gaṇanipātanena samāse kate mayūrasaddo nipphajjatīti dassetumāha
anya-e0806n1:129_6: tadabhidhāyi satthamapyabhidhāne-bhidheyyo pacārā tadatthatāya vā niruttamuccate,
anya-e0806n1:129_8: veditabbāti iminā niruttasatthe ye saddā paṭipadaṁ nipphādiyanti tesamidaṁ sāmaññena nipphādananti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:129_9: dvāre niyutto dovārikoti ettha ṇike dakāravakārānaṁ majjhe okārāgamo,
anya-e0806n1:129_13: Atha vaṇṇavikāroti vuttattā javaṇṇassa yādese niyakādayo tāva sijjhantu,
anya-e0806n1:129_15: Aññathā vaṇṇasamudāyādesassa visuṁgahaṇe chabbitopattiyā ‘pañcavidhaṁ nirutta’nti saṅkhyāniyamo na yujjeyyāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n1:129_19: Mayūroti ettha ravati mayūrarāve eva vattate,
anya-e0806n1:133_0: Yantaṁ saddānaṁ niccasambandhittepi pakkantavisayattā taṁsaddo yaṁsaddaṁ nāpekkhatetyāha-‘teti anantara’iccādi,
anya-e0806n1:133_1: taṁ saddo hi pakkanta visayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo ca yaṁsaddaṁ nāpekkhate,
anya-e0806n1:136_0: Etissā gāthāya amhehi vitthāritanayena gahetabbaṁ, yathā rahanti sakammākammadhātūnamanurūpaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:138_0: Kiñcāpīdaṁ idaṁkiñcāpi (potthake) vikappanatthaṁ katanti heṭṭhimena ni(nnāna)ttaṁ viññāyati,
anya-e0806n1:138_2: heṭṭhime pana kvacādhikārā hakārantadhātuto dhyaṇpaccaye mehyaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:140_2: soyamattho sumaṅgalappasādaniyā khuddasikkhā ṭīkāya‘ādito upasampannā’ti ettha amhehi vuttanayena veditabbo,
anya-e0806n1:142_0: Yaṁvattateti vuttivacanaṁ nikkhipitvā tassa atthaṁ vattumārabhate ‘sambhavāpekkhāye’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_1: yaṁvattateti ca sutte avijjamānepi gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacāroti vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:142_2: yasaddassāniyamatthavuttittepi padavākyato nāññaṁ sambhavati vicchāyamābhikkhaññe ca vattamānanti āha ‘sambhavāpekkhāyapadaṁ vākyaṁvā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:142_4: tasmiṁ apekkhāya padaṁ vākyaṁ vā vattateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:142_6: nanu padassa vākyassa vā visuṁyeva dabbādayo atthā,
anya-e0806n1:142_7: taṁ kathamida metasmiṁ vattudhamme kiriyādhamme ca vicchābhikkhaññatthe vattateti anuyogaṁ sandhāyāha-‘visayabhāvenā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_8: vicchāya vattudhammassa kiriyādhammassa cābhikkhaññassa visayo padaṁ vākyaṁ vā…
anya-e0806n1:142_11: abhidhāyakattena ceti gocarattena pakāsakattena cāti attho,
anya-e0806n1:142_12: yaṁvattateti ajjhāhaṭassa yanti paṭhamantassa vibhattivipariṇāmaṁ dasseti (tassāti) ādinā,
anya-e0806n1:142_15: kathaṁ dve iccādesaniddesā ādeso ca sambandhīnamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n1:142_18: tasmā vicchābhikkhaññesu yaṁ padaṁ vākyaṁ vā vattate tassa dve bhavanticcevaṁ chaṭṭhīyattho sakkā vattu”nti,
anya-e0806n1:142_19: dve rūpāni hontīti dassitaṁ hotīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:142_20: saddarūpe saṅkhyayyeti dutiyā bahuvacanantaṁ paṭipādayamānoti ettha paṭipādanakiriyāya sambandhenopadiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:142_21: “vākyantaraṭṭhopi saddo tadaññasmimpi sambandhamupayātī”ti dvisaddoti idaṁ upari vākyadvayepyupayujjati ‘dvisaddo vutto,
anya-e0806n1:142_23: atha sarūpappadhāno kasmā na vuttoti āha-‘bahuvacanena niddesā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:142_24: atha dveti sāmaññena vuttattā padavākyānaṁ ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ vā siyā,
anya-e0806n1:142_26: tathā sati ‘yaṁvattate tassā’ti kasmā paṭhamameva nissāya vuttiyaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katanti āha-‘evañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_27: idāni dvippayogapakkhassa sadosattā agahitabhāvaṁ dassetumāha-‘yadātvi’ tyādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_28: tusaddo pubbasmā pakkhā visesassa padassako visesanattho (potthake),
anya-e0806n1:142_31: āvuttī saṅkhyeyyāti evaṁ maññate “dvisaddo-yaṁ “ādasahi saṅkhyā saṅkhyeyye vattante”ti vacanato saṅkhyeyyavacano,
anya-e0806n1:142_32: tasmeha saṅkhyeyyaṁ saddarūpaṁ vā siyā āvutti vā,
anya-e0806n1:142_33: iccapi niddeso tadubhayamapekkhiya napuṁsakaliṅgena vā siyā itthiliṅgena vā,
anya-e0806n1:142_37: tadā saddassāvuttī uccāraṇalakkhaṇā kiriyā saṅkhyeyā bhavanti,
anya-e0806n1:142_39: tadā dvippayogo dvibbavacananti esa pakkhoti ayamettha bhāvo” yadā dve āvuttiyo vidhīyante tadā dvippayogo dvibbacanante sopekkho,
anya-e0806n1:142_40: (atra ṭhānyādesabhāvo natthi) natuṭṭhāne dvibbacanapakkho (potthake) āvutti hi kiriyā,
anya-e0806n1:142_42: na ca kiriyāya sādhanassa ca ṭhānyādesabhāvo upapajjate,
anya-e0806n1:142_47: te hi dutiyampi pakkhamabbhupagamma upacāramattato bhedo,
anya-e0806n1:142_50: ṇyo nasiyāti “tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-59) bhāve vidhīyamāno ṇyo dvippayogapakkhe
anya-e0806n1:142_51: saddabhedasabbhāvā puna puneti samudāyasabhāvato punapuna bhāvoti atthe punapuna samudāyato na bhaveyyāti attho,
anya-e0806n1:142_53: atha kho ekapadantogadhānaṁ sarānaṁ sarānamādibhūtassukārassa bhavanto okāropi “sarānamādissā yuvaṇṇassā eo ṇānubandhe”ti (4-124) na siyā,
anya-e0806n1:142_56: pubbapakkhepi hi dve saddarūpānyevādisīyanteti hoteva pada bhedo,
anya-e0806n1:142_62: aññatheti upacarito bhedo na sabhāvatoti ce,
anya-e0806n1:142_63: kāriyambhavatīti evi na sakkā vattunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:142_64: sabhāvato tvabhedo vāti upacārābhāvena vatthuto vijjamānabhedamavadhārayati,
anya-e0806n1:142_66: āvuttiyeva na siyāti etthāyamadhippāyo “yadi sabhāvatova bhedo bhinnassa pana kathamāvutti siyā”ti,
anya-e0806n1:143_5: tenāti yena bahuvacananiddesena sakiṁ byāpanicchā jotīyati tena karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtena vā,
anya-e0806n1:143_7: tattha ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyo ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyoti kamena byāpitumicchā,
anya-e0806n1:143_11: natthi sākallena kamena (potthake) byāpitumiṭṭhattanti sakalabyāpanicchāyābhāvoti na dvibbacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:143_16: ekamatthaṁ ñāpayissāmīti jātisaddo payujjate ane katthanissayāca vicchā,
anya-e0806n1:143_26: tassa saddassa yaṁ rūpaṁ atta bhāvo,
anya-e0806n1:143_27: tameva paccāsatyā “sutānumitesu sutasambandhova balavā”ti vicchā bhikkhaññesu vattamānassa sutasseva
anya-e0806n1:143_28: tassa rūpassa paccāsannabhāvato dvisaṅkhyā yuttaṁ dvisaṅkhātāya saṅkhyāya ‘rukkhaṁ rukkha’miccevaṁ yuttaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_32: tathāhi sabbeyevetettha vicchāyaṁ dvittehyabhidhayanteti bahattā bahuvacanaṁ pappoti,
anya-e0806n1:143_33: ekavacanantu na sijjhati ‘rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ siñcatī’ti ekatthābhidhānabhinnasabbarukkhappatītīti kathamekavacanantassa
anya-e0806n1:143_35: atthasāmatthiyāti ‘bahuvacanantappayogehi’ccādinā vakkhamānanayena bahuvacanantappayogeneva vicchātthajotanato na tattha dvībbacanaṁ siyā,
anya-e0806n1:143_37: e) kavacanattamantarena na cātthi dvibbacanāvakā soti patīti balāvagato yo-ttho,
anya-e0806n1:143_46: ato yevāti bahuvacanantassa saddasattiyā vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvāyeva,
anya-e0806n1:143_47: evamaññate- ‘idha pana yogapajjaṁ duvidhaṁ saddayogapajjaṁ atthayogapajjañca,
anya-e0806n1:143_48: tattha kiñci sātthakānaṁ saddayogapajjamatthayoga pajjaṁ na sambhavatīti,
anya-e0806n1:143_49: yugapadi adhikaraṇaṁ dhavādi attho yassa sodhavakhadirapalāsasaddo yugapadādhikaraṇo,
anya-e0806n1:143_53: taṁ sahavacanicchāyanti iminā dassitanti tassaṁ sahavacanicchāyañca sati,
anya-e0806n1:143_54: sobhanā dhavakhadirapalāsā sobhanā rukkhāti sobhanaguṇayogepi bahuvacaneneva vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvoti,
anya-e0806n1:143_55: sobhanaṁ dhavakhadiranti pana satīpi saddayogapajje samāhārattā natthatthayogapajja nātvayāgapajja (potthake)
anya-e0806n1:143_56: nti ekavacanantattā dvittappasaṅgepi sobhanaṁ dhavakhadiranti saddānaṁ sakiṁ byāpanicchāyābhāvā na dvibbacananti
anya-e0806n1:144_2: atthevānupubbiyepi vicchā tatova dvittanti paṭipādaya ‘mānupubbiya’miccādinā ‘atthiyeveccādino vuttivākyassa vivaraṇamāha.
anya-e0806n1:144_3: Gāmajātiyā tulyajātiyānaṁ disā desādibhedena bhinnānamiva gāmānaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:144_10: na hi gogoti vutte (vāhīka)gatā vicchāvagamyateti ācariyajinindabuddhinā ānupubbiye vicchāyābhāvaṁ paṭipāditaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:144_11: taṁ vighaṭayituṁ ‘yadi hi’ccādinā yaṁ vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:144_15: yassūparibhāgo atthi tampi mūlanti mūla byapadesassāpekkhā katattamāha,
anya-e0806n1:144_17: tathā aññepi mūlaggabhāgāti iminā mūlaggabhedānaṁ heṭṭhā viya gahaṇe sati bahuttamāha,
anya-e0806n1:144_19: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “mūlādīnaṁ bāhullena thūlādi guṇayogammantvā sattamīvibhattiyuttena mūlādisaddasahitena
anya-e0806n1:144_20: sabba saddena mūlādikamatthamabhisaṁharitvā sabbasmiṁ mūle thūlā sabbasmiṁ agge sukhumāti evaṁ (vattuno)
anya-e0806n1:145_0: Jeṭṭhānaṁ vicchāsambhave sabbakaniṭṭhassa jeṭṭhattābhāvānuppaveso na siyāti ānupubbiyamattavacanicchāyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:145_8: vatticchādibandhaneti vattuno icchā nibandhanaṁ kāraṇamassāti samāso,
anya-e0806n1:146_0: “Sakatthe vadhāriyamāne nekasmiṁ dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8-1-12-vā) vāttikakārena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:146_2: atthappakāraṇādyanapekkhassa padassa atthe sakatthe avadhāriyamāne ettakameveti gammamāne anekasmiṁ diyyamāne
anya-e0806n1:146_4: ayampanesamadhippāyo ‘māsakaṁ māsakaṁ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ dehī tyatra dve eva māsā dātumicchitā,
anya-e0806n1:147_0: Cattāro vihayo guñjā, dveguñjā māsako bhave;
anya-e0806n1:149_1: tattha na sabbe kahāpaṇa sambandhino māsā dānakiriyāya byāpitā,
anya-e0806n1:149_5: māsakaṁ māsakamiccādotvayamadhippāyo-“dehīti dānakiriyāya māssa byāpitumiṭṭhāti vicchāyamevettha dvibbacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:149_8: avadhāraṇe patīyamāneti kahāpaṇasambandhini bahumhi māsakasamudāye māsakadvayanicchaye viññāyamāne sati,
anya-e0806n1:149_9: avisesena sāmaññena māsānaṁ dehīti dānakiriyāya byāpanā bhāvāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:149_14: saddantaratoti iminā padantarayogo gahitoti āha-‘padantarena yogato’ti ayametthādhippāyo “dvittakaraṇakāle
anya-e0806n1:149_16: tadanu pana imamhā kahāpaṇātisaddantarasambandhe sati yadi kahāpaṇasambandhya na vasesamāsakavicchā pariggayhati
anya-e0806n1:149_18: imamhā kahāpaṇāti pana avadhipañcamīniddesato kahāpaṇato dvayameva gahetvā bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ dehīti
anya-e0806n1:150_2: pubbapaṭhamānaṁ pubbapaṭhama saddānaṁ atthātisayo yo atthassa pakaṁso,
anya-e0806n1:150_4: sabbapaṭhamabhāvasaṅkhāta atthātisayamattāva vacanicchāti na ettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:150_5: vikasanakiriyāya pākakiriyāyāti vuttepi vikāsakaraṇakiriyāya pākakaraṇakiriyāyāti atthasambhavato ‘pubbaṁ pubbaṁ puppha’nti tyādo,
anya-e0806n1:150_7: paṭhamaṁ paṭhamaṁ vacanaṁ karontīti kiriyāvisesanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n1:150_8: pubbāti matā paṭhamābhimatāti iminā pubbapaṭhamabhāvenābhimatānaṁ bahutta byāpanena vicchāsabbhāve kāraṇamāha.
anya-e0806n1:151_0: “Ḍatara ḍatamānaṁ samasampadhāraṇāyamitthīnigade bhāve dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8-1-12-vā) vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:151_7: tasmiṁ itthiliṅge bhāve vattamānānaṁ ratararatamantānaṁ dvibbacanamabhimatanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:151_9: samena aḍḍhatādinā guṇena ime ubho aḍḍhā itvevaṁ rūpā sampadhāraṇā nirūpanā avabodho samasampadhāraṇā,
anya-e0806n1:151_12: aḍḍhatāya bahuvidhattābhāvā kiriyādiyo gābhāvā ca natthettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:151_13: pucchiyamānāti iminā ime ubho’ iccādīnaṁ pucchāvākyataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n1:152_1: iminā ākhyātādīnameva kiriyājotakapadabhāvena ponopuññasaṅkhātakiriyā dhammassa dhanasameva visayattaṁ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:152_2: atisayavisiṭṭhanti iminā papacatisaddepakāro pakaṁsattha jotako upasaggoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:152_3: hividhimhīti’lū-cchedane’iccasmā vidhimhi hippaccayo “pañhapattanāvidhīsu”ti (6-9) iminā suttenāti attho,
anya-e0806n1:152_5: ‘pubbeka-kattukāna” (5-62) miccevāti evakārena paresamivāyamapyābhikkhaññe paccayo ce vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n1:152_6: tadā papacatiiccatra viya ābhikkhaññe vidhīyamānena paccayeneva ābhikkhaññatthassa pakāsitattā na dvibbacanena bhavitabbanti dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:152_7: yadā tu bhusaṁ punappunaṁ pacatīti vacanicchā tadāpi papacatīti bhavatyeva.
anya-e0806n1:153_1: ābhikkhaññe iccevāti iminā anukaraṇamattamevetaṁ natthetthābhikkhaññanti pāṇiniyā suttantarena dvittampaṭipādenti,
anya-e0806n1:153_4: evamaññate “paṭaiccetamanukaraṇaṁ bhavana kiriyampati vattatīti bhavanakiriyāmatī vuttīti (potthake) kiriyādhammaṁ ponopuññamettha atthevā”ti,
anya-e0806n1:153_7: rāppaccayoti paṭhamaṁ dvitte kate pacchā rāppaccayo,
anya-e0806n1:153_9: dīgho niccanti paṭhamaṁ dvitte paṭapaṭakarotīti ṭhite niccaṁ dīgho,
anya-e0806n1:153_10: paṭapaṭā karotīti ettha nipphattiṁ dassetvā idāni paṭapaṭāyatīti ettha dassetuṁ paṭapaṭāyatītiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:155_0: Ekassa ekassa iti ṭhite pubbavibhattiyā lutte saṁhitāyañca katāyaṁ ekekassa,
anya-e0806n1:155_1: evaṁ matthakena matthakenāti ṭhite matthaka matthakenāti.
anya-e0806n1:157_0: Aññaṁ aññanti ṭhite iminā vibhattiyā lope akārassa “tadaminā” (1-47) dinā okāre aññoññantipi hoti.
anya-e0806n1:161_0: Kvaci pavatyappavatti, kvacaññaṁ kvaci vā kvaci;
